Package de.fourofakind.businesshotel

Class EmployeeTestClass

java.lang.Object
de.fourofakind.businesshotel.EmployeeTestClass
public class EmployeeTestClass
extends java.lang.Object

Test Class to test all of the Employee's abilities

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) DateFrame Heute  
    (package private) ConferenceRoomBooking NullBooking  
    (package private) DateFrame NullDateFrame  
    (package private) Employee NullEmployee  
    (package private) ConferenceRoom NullRoom  
    (package private) TimeFrame NullTimeFrame  
    (package private) HotelRoom TestRoom1  
    (package private) HotelRoom TestRoom2  
    (package private) HotelRoom TestRoom3  
    (package private) ConferenceRoom TestRoom4  
    (package private) TimeFrame zwoelfBisMittag  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    EmployeeTestClass()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    (package private) void changeCustomer()
    Test of an Employee's ability to change a customer in Customers ArrayList
    (package private) void createCustomer()
    Test of an Employee's ability to create a customer and add it to Customers ArrayList
    (package private) void deleteCustomer()
    Test of an Employee's ability to delete a customer from Customers ArrayList
    (package private) void findBooking()
    Test of an Employee's ability to search for a booking according to given bookingNo or RoomNo+DateFrame+TimeFrame Prove of the function's reliability is given by comparing the results of each search parameter combination and the testbooking just added in the test
    (package private) void manageBookingRequests()
    Test of the implemnetation an autonomous management of customer requests, based on whether or not a suitable room is free at the time given.
    (package private) void outputCustomer()
    Output customers in Customers ArrayList
    void shouldChangeBookingDataIfSuccesful()
    Test of an Employee's ability to change a booking according to given parameters Prove of the function's reliability is given by putting out all of the booking's details before and after the change and comparing them
    void shouldDeleteBookingIfSuccesful()
    Test of an Employee's ability to delete a booking according to given bookingNo and storing it into the 'Bookings' list Prove of the function's reliability is given by putting out all of the booking's details
    void shouldOutputAllBookingDetailsIfSuccesful()
    Test of an Employee's ability to create a booking according to given parameters and storing it into the 'Bookings' list Prove of the function's reliability is given by putting out all of the booking's details
    void shouldOutputEmployeeNameWhenSuccessful()
    Test of the Employee Constructor to ensure correct function of the constructor and storing of an employee in the 'Employees' list
    void shouldOutputEmployeeNumberWhenSuccessful()
    Second Test of the Employee Constructor to ensure correct function of the constructor and storing of an employee in the 'Employees' list
    (package private) void showAllBookings()
    Test of an Employee's ability to show all bookings e.g. for analysis Prove of the function's reliability is given by comparing the results of the function showAllBookings and the handmade expectedOutput StringBuilder object
    (package private) void TestRightManagementIfNoRoleGiven()
    Test of the implementation of Roles as a right management tool Prove of the function's reliability is given by a not successful creation of a customer, but with the throw of an IllegalCallerException
    (package private) void TestRightManagementIfRoleGiven()
    Test of the implementation of Roles as a right management tool Prove of the function's reliability is given by a successful creation of a customer without an exception

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
